description.narrative: 1. Increase access to quality and affordable dialysis medical devices. The Project will support an established domestic medical device manufacturer to expand its manufacturing capabilities in dialysis medical device. This is expected to increase the availability and affordability of dialysis medical services. 2. Promote private sector participation in the provision of dialysis treatment. The successful implementation of the Project will demonstrate to other investors the financial viability of a private sector operated standalone dialysis center, which is expected to encourage private sector participation in this area. 3. Create skilled employment opportunities. The Project will create employment opportunities for a number of specialty healthcare positions and provide training and support to its medical staff, including for doctors training for nephrologists. 4. Benefits to the local economy and local linkages: The Project will help create demand for locally-sourced materials, services and labor, majority of which are likely to be provided by small and medium enterprises.

Shandong Weigao Group Medical Polymer Company Limited (Weigao, or the Company), a Chinese medical device company listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, is planning to expand its presence in the Chinese dialysis treatment market through: (i) the expansion of its manufacturing capacity for dialyzer, tubing and related consumables; and (ii) the opening of additional Company-operated standalone dialysis centers (together, the Project).
